UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Molecular characterization and antimicrobial activity of cecropin family in Hermetia illucens.
Literature.Author: Peng J, Li L, Wan Y, Yang Y, An X, Yuan K, Qiu Z, Jiang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCC 10104(MIC=128µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=128µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis BNCC 109047 (MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=128µg/ml)
